title: ScummVM pack, 1 DVD, 24 games (Monkey Island, Sam & Max etc)
description:
The archive contains these games (along with docs):

Beneath a Steel Sky
Broken Sword 1
Broken Sword 2
Day of the Tentacle
Drascula
Flight of the Amazon Queen
Full Throttle
Gobliiins 1
I Have No Mouth and I Must Scream
Indiana Jones 3
Indiana Jones 4
Inherit the Earth
Loom
Lure of the Temptress
Maniac Mansion
Monkey Island 1
Monkey Island 2
Monkey Island 3
Passport to Adventure
Sam & Max
Simon the Sorcerer 1
Simon the Sorcerer 2
The Dig
Zak McKracken

The unzipped archive is 3.9GB, which means it will fit on a single DVD. Only the most advanced version of each game is included (the version with the best graphics, best sound, voice-over if available etc). The archive also includes the ScummVM emulator for Windows, Mac, Gamecube, PSP, Wii and Windows CE, and instructions on where to download it for other platforms, such as Linux, PS2, Nintendo DS etc. There are also detailed instructions on how to install and launch the games.
